target_markets.market_description: People with health concerns who need quick medical guidance
demographics: People in areas with limited healthcare access
pain_points: Uncertainty about whether skin marks/symptoms require doctor visit
Fear of waiting too long for medical attention
Limited access to primary care doctors
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Millions of Canadians don't have access to primary doctors, US has many uninsured people

problems_validated.problem: People get skin marks, rashes, or symptoms and don't know if they should see a doctor immediately or wait
problems_validated.severity: High - can be life-threatening (skin cancer example provided)
problems_validated.current_solutions: Going to ChatGPT for medical advice, waiting it out, or going to doctor immediately
problems_validated.market_gap: No dedicated AI app for quick medical triage with photo analysis

products_tools.name: Cal AI
products_tools.use_case: AI calorie tracking app from pictures
products_tools.metrics: over $1 million per month in revenue

products_tools.name: ChatGPT
products_tools.metrics: Studies show it's beating doctors in many areas

business_strategies.strategy: Create user investment through history/logging features
business_strategies.implementation: Build a feed-like history showing previous scans, chats, and symptom quizzes
business_strategies.expected_results: Users stick with your app even when competitors emerge because their data is already there
business_strategies.case_study: Cal AI uses this approach with food logging history

business_strategies.strategy: Do UX design yourself first, then hire designers to make it prettier
business_strategies.implementation: Create basic sketches and wireframes, then outsource visual design on platforms like Upwork
business_strategies.expected_results: Faster iteration and cost-effective design process
business_strategies.case_study: Zach's approach for building apps quickly

problems_solutions.problem: Building an AI medical app quickly
problems_solutions.solution: Focus on three core features: photo diagnosis, symptoms quiz, and chatbot
steps: Implement photo analysis using GPT technology
Create symptoms quiz with percentage likelihood
problems_solutions.time_estimate: less than a month to launch

startup_ideas.idea: Dr AI - AI-powered medical triage app
startup_ideas.target_market: People with health concerns, especially uninsured or those with limited healthcare access
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Helps people determine if symptoms require immediate medical attention or can wait
startup_ideas.validation: Friend's skin cancer story, widespread use of ChatGPT for medical questions

mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Legal issues and user safety concerns
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Heavily disclaim that AI diagnosis is not 100% accurate
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Zach emphasizes the need for disclaimers throughout the discussion

steps: User takes photo of skin condition
Recommends whether to see doctor or wait
ai_workflows.use_case: Quick medical triage for skin conditions

steps: Returns ranked possibilities with percentage likelihood

trends_signals.trend: AI outperforming doctors in medical diagnosis
trends_signals.opportunity: AI-powered healthcare apps becoming more viable and trusted

trends_signals.trend: People using ChatGPT for medical advice
trends_signals.opportunity: Dedicated medical AI apps can capture this existing behavior

actionable_quotes.quote: I really think it is the future of healthcare
actionable_quotes.actionability: Invest in AI healthcare solutions now while the market is emerging

actionable_quotes.quote: The goal of this app isn't to tell you do you have something or do you not it's to tell you is it safe to just wait it out or should you go see a doctor right away
actionable_quotes.context: Defining the core value proposition of Dr AI
actionable_quotes.actionability: Focus on triage rather than diagnosis to reduce liability and provide clear value

actionable_quotes.quote: You could build very quickly and get it up and running launch it and have everything a full business running in less than a month
actionable_quotes.context: Describing the Dr AI app development timeline
actionable_quotes.actionability: Prioritize speed to market with AI apps using existing GPT technology

key_statistics.statistic: Over $1 million a month in revenue
key_statistics.context: Cal AI app performance by 17-year-old founder

key_statistics.statistic: Millions of Canadians don't have access to primary doctors
